description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is an anonymous comment about the Governor who told students to “look the other way” if they are bothered by mandated postings of the Ten Commandments: Funny how theocrats never practice what they preach. They refuse to simply “look the other way” when bothered by, […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
